changes: The launch of the revamped and improved Solblist™ website.
New additions includes Player Profiles, Compare, Stats, Themes, and more.
Removed Herobrine.
Added 'Completion Timeline' to the Player Profiles page.
Changed the fonts for the 'Hell', 'Pastel', and 'Rainbow' themes to make them more readable.
Added Herobrine.
Added the 'Legacy List' (finally). Some legacy levels don't have victors because I dont know them.
Changed the y-axis on the 'Completion Timeline' graph to 'List Rank', because that makes more sense.
Added 'List Changelog' to the Changelog page. You can see it on the right here. --->
Fixed the placement of first victors on the list.
Removed Herobrine again.
Added level IDs to the list.
Made the 'Levels Completed' stat on the player profiles just account for the main list.
I am inside your home.
You left your door unlocked.
Changed Challenge of the Month to quarterly format (cuz no ones making challenges every month bro).
Simplified challenge display by removing difficulty and description fields.
Fixed theme flash when navigating between pages.
Updated challenge button to an info card showing more details.
Replaced trophy emojis with ★.
I'm going to break into your house and steal your money.
Bloodbath and moment have been swapped, with Bloodbath now above at #3.
Cupid has been lowered from #7 to #10, above Broken Signal and below Overtime.
Napalm and TROLLMACHINE have been swapped, with Napalm now above at #12.
Falling Up has been raised from the Legacy List to #15, below Crowd Control. This pushes Allegiance into the Legacy List.
Falling Up and Crowd Control have been swapped, with Falling up now above at #14.
Solarion has been placed at #1, dethroning Black Blizzard that has reigned for 1494 days. This pushes Crowd Control into the legacy list.
Voided added to the legacy list.
Hyper Paradox has been placed at #3, below Black Blizzard and above Blade of Justice. This pushes Falling Up into the legacy list.
gravity and moment have been swapped, with gravity now above at #6.
pri demon th added as the Q4 2025 challenge.
